column4: hi, im using ubuntu on a device with a low resolution (eee) and i was wondering where to disable the setting that keeps me from moving windows up when the titlebar is already at the top of the screen
(some windows just wont fit and i like to press OK buttons ;)
you can hold-alt and click anywhere in the window , and drag them past. normally from anyehere in the window
thats what im trying but it blocks once the titlebar hits the top
